name: Sal Swift
education: Master Degree in Politics from the University of Texas San Antonio (2019)
work_experience: Living Environment Improvement Coordinator for Green Valley (2020-2022)
vision: Create a vibrant and inclusive community where everyone feels valued and connected. By promoting diversity, fostering collaboration, and empowering individuals, we can build a community that thrives and supports its members.

name: Amiko Chen
education: Bachelor of Science in Environmental Science from the University of California, Berkeley (2018)
vision: My vision is to create a sustainable and resilient community that prioritizes environmental protection and conservation. I want to promote renewable energy, reduce waste and pollution, and protect natural habitats and biodiversity.

name: Jordan Rodriguez
education: Master of Social Work from the University of Texas at Austin (2020)
work_experience: Social Worker at Austin Public Health (2020-2023)
vision: Create a community that provides support and resources for all residents, regardless of their backgrounds or circumstances. I want to promote social equity and justice, reduce poverty and inequality, and ensure that everyone has access to quality education, healthcare, and housing.

name: Blake Kim
education: Bachelor of Science in Criminal Justice from the University of California, Irvine (2017)
work_experience: Police Officer at Los Angeles Police Department (2017-2023)
vision: My vision is to create a safe and secure community where residents can live without fear of crime or violence. I want to promote community policing, increase police accountability and transparency, and reduce crime and recidivism through restorative justice programs.
